item.title: An Introduction to Running Java on Kubernetes
item.description: An Introduction to Running Java on Kubernetes You will need access to a container build tool, a container runtime environment, and a kubernetes environment. There will be suggestions along the way for acquiring these. You will need a virtualization technology to run the minikube or minishift VMs for your kubernetes development environment. Build a Demo Spring Boot App Build an app $ mkdir -p my-java-app/container $ cd my-java-app $ git clone https://github.
